title: Intel CEO to oversee its AI efforts after executive departs for OpenAI
description: CEO Tan Lip-bu will take over the chipmaker’s artificial intelligence efforts after AI chief Sachin Katti leaves to join OpenAI.
content:
Sachin Katti, who has led Intel’s AI efforts since a management reorganisation at the chipmaker in January, said on social media that he had joined OpenAI.

title: AI scams fuel rise in fake online car sales. How California is trying to protect consumers.
description: Buying a car is one of the biggest purchases we make, and more people are turning to online marketplaces for deals on used cars. But thanks to artificial intelligence, you're more likely than ever to get scammed.

title: CNBC Daily Open: AI is back - it never really went away
description: Investors piled back into artificial intelligence names on Monday stateside. "AI-related stocks should drive equity markets," an analyst said.
content:
Investors piled back into artificial intelligence names on Monday stateside. Shares of Nvidia jumped 5.8%, Broadcom advanced 2.6% and Microsoft climbed 1.9% to end its eight-day losing streak, its longest consecutive decline since 2011.
